full_summary:
**Stage 1 - Dune Crossing Boardwalk Repairs, Cavendish Beach and Brackley Beach, Prince Edward Island National Park, PEI**

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify

**Procurement Category:** CNST

**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-22-0280/A

**Publication Date:** 2023-03-17

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-23 13:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada

**Project Description:**

Parks Canada is seeking a Prime General Contractor for the repair of dune crossing boardwalks at Cavendish Beach and Brackley Beach, within the Prince Edward Island National Park.

**Job Requirements:**

The successful bidder will be responsible for the provision of all materials, labor, equipment, and ancillaries necessary to complete the work as indicated on the drawings and described in the specifications and notes. Key elements of the project include:

* Repair and replacement of boardwalk components
* Installation of new steel pile saddles and connection brackets
* Design, supply, and installation of helical piles
* Realignment of ramps and intermediate landings
* Reconstruction of lower stairs rail systems
* Removal and disposal of existing timbers

**Selecting the Right Bidder:**

The selection process is staged and will involve two phases. The first phase will assess the qualifications of all bidders. The second phase will invite qualified bidders to provide a financial bid on the project.

**Additional Instructions:**

* Bidders must submit their offers via fax or email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).
* The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes.
* Bidders are responsible for any failure attributable to the transmission or receipt of the emailed bid due to file size.
* Late submissions will not be considered.

**Enquiries:**

* All inquiries regarding this bid must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Officer at [christine.piche@pc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.piche@pc.gc.ca).
* Inquiries must be received no later than three (3) business days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.

**Site Visit:**

Optional site visits will be held on March 21, 2023. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than March 20, 2023 at 3:00 PM
